prompt: Design a 'Contact Us' page with a soft green background (Color(0xFFE8F5E9)) and a fresh, natural aesthetic. Feature a centered 'Contact Us' title in forest green (Color(0xFF2E7D32)) with a font size of 35 and bold weight. Add a subtitle in dark grey (Color(0xFF455A64)) below, inviting users to reach out. Display three contact methods (Phone: +1 234 567 8900, Email: support@company.com, Address: 456 Main St, City, Country) in a vertical stack of cards with a white background, elevation 3, and rounded corners (radius 10). Use forest green icons for phone, email, and location, positioned to the left of the text. Below, include a contact form with Name, Email, Subject, and Message fields, using filled text fields with light green (Color(0xFFC8E6C9)) backgrounds and green borders. Add a full-width forest green 'Submit' button. Use padding of EdgeInsets.all(20) and 15 pixels vertical spacing for a refreshing Column layout.
